title: The Pudding Awards
description: The best visual and data-driven stories of 2018

prelude.value: Last year we put together a list of our favorite stories of 2017. This year we want to step it up by democratizing the process and rewarding üí∞creators.

This time around it is on you to submit your story. No categories either, we are just looking for the best stories (that are visually and data-driven), full stop. Oh, and we‚Äôve assembled an All-Star crew of practitioners to help us judge. Details below.

details.value: Entries are free, just give us a URL! (One per person, please)
There will be two entry tiers - one for passion projects, one for paid projects
Three winners will be crowned in each tier
Passion Tier - A share of the $3,141.59 prize pool
Paid Tier - An office/newsroom/apartment üçïparty on us
Hit us up at sup@pudding.cool for any other questions!
